hero.description: Industrial & Technical Engineering Consultancy. We transform your industrial challenges into sustainable growth opportunities.
hero.fundingDesc: Industrial investment grants secured for our clients.

expertise.title: Our Areas of Expertise
expertise.subtitle: An integrated approach for your performance.

bei.title: IEB (Industrial Engineering Bureau)
bei.description: The IEB division is dedicated to optimizing industrial performance. We operate from investment strategy through to operational excellence on the ground. Our approach combines technical expertise and financial engineering to maximize your return on investment.
bei.feature1Desc: From Project Setup, Master Plan to Fundraising and GRANT Acquisition.
bei.feature2Desc: Improve Your Performance and Maximize Your Industrial Output.
bei.feature3Desc: Studies, Engineering & Transformation of industrial processes. Cost Competitiveness.
bei.method1Desc: In-depth analysis of existing operations (SWOT, Flows, Costs).
bei.method2Desc: Definition of master plan and investments.
bei.method4Desc: Implementation of KPIs and work standards.

bet.title: TEB (Technical Engineering Bureau)
bet.shortDesc: Technical and Multi-Sector Engineering All Trades
bet.description: Our TEB division ensures technical project management for your construction and development projects. From complex structures to fluid networks, we guarantee compliance, safety and durability of your installations.
bet.feature1Desc: Building Strength and Safety for Your Projects (Framework & Reinforced Concrete).
bet.feature2Desc: Powering & Optimizing Your Innovative Energy Solutions.
bet.feature3Desc: Reliable solutions ensuring optimal management of your flows.
bet.method2Desc: Structural calculations, reinforcement plans and networks.
bet.method4Desc: Assistance with reception operations and DOE.

projects.title: Our Flagship Projects
projects.subtitle: Concrete Achievements, Measurable Results
projects.discoverMore: Discover our other achievements and projects

bei-papier.title: Paper Sector: Industrial Assistance Co-Generation Project 3MW Turbine
bei-papier.fullDescription: As part of a major modernization for a leader in the paper sector, NL Solutions led the integration of a co-generation plant. This complex project required an in-depth analysis of existing energy flows to size a 3MW turbine capable of covering 80% of the site's electrical needs while producing the steam necessary for paper drying. Our intervention drastically reduced the energy bill and improved the plant's carbon footprint.

bei-plasturgie.title: Plastics Sector: Industrial & Supply Chain Audit â€“ Due Diligence MITSUI
bei-plasturgie.desc: Industrial & Supply Chain Audit â€“ Due Diligence MITSUI (Japanese Multinational).
bei-plasturgie.fullDescription: Mandated for a technical Due Diligence mission as part of a strategic merger, we audited the entire value chain of a plastics giant. The study covered the condition of injection equipment, supply chain efficiency and QHSE compliance. The 10-year master plan we delivered served as a roadmap to unlock double-digit growth potential.
details: Master Plan (over 10 years) and industrial capacity needs

bei-parachimie.title: Parachemicals Sector: Manufacturing Process Organization
bei-parachimie.fullDescription: For this parachemical project, the objective was clear: prepare the company for international export standards. We re-engineered production flows, eliminated bottlenecks and implemented real-time performance indicators (KPIs). Result: a 25% increase in production capacity without major machinery investment, solely through operational excellence.
details: +50 MMAD revenue for new international contracts

bei-semipublic.title: Semi-Public Sector: Support for Leather Federation and Fes Chamber of Commerce for new P21 Ain Cheggag
bei-semipublic.desc: Support for the Leather Federation and Fes Chamber of Commerce for the new P21 Ain Cheggag.
bei-semipublic.fullDescription: A national-scale project aimed at structuring the leather sector in the Fes region. NL Solutions supported the Leather Federation and Fes Chamber of Commerce in the technical definition of the Integrated Industrial Park (P2I) Ain Cheggag. We assisted over 30 industrialists in preparing their technical and financial dossiers for installation in this new zone, thus securing a coherent and efficient industrial ecosystem.
details: +30 Industrial unit projects in the leather sector
+15 Industrial unit projects in agri-food, metalworking, parachemistry, services,...
+ 40 MMAD in state subsidies to date

bei-emballage.title: Packaging Sector: Lean Manufacturing Offset â€“ 'Mouwakaba' MarocPME
bei-emballage.fullDescription: Targeted Lean Manufacturing intervention in an industrial packaging printing company. Through the Mouwakaba program, we deployed 5S and SMED tools to reduce changeover times. The impact on cost was immediate, restoring the company's competitiveness against international competition.

bei-agro.title: Agri-Food Sector: Industrial Assistance on Multiple Strategic Axes
bei-agro.desc: Industrial assistance on multiple strategic axes.
bei-agro.fullDescription: Complete support for a rapidly expanding agri-food unit. Industrial assistance on several strategic axes including the design of the plant Re-Layout to integrate new packaging lines, definition of the 5-year Industrial Master Plan, technical engineering, facilities and plant ReLayout. We also conducted Due Diligence on behalf of FIPAR (CDG Group) â€“ 300 MMAD operation.
details: Technical engineering, facilities and plant ReLayout
Due Diligence for FIPAR (CDG Group) â€“ 300 MMAD operation

bet-infra.title: Semi-Public Sector: TCE Studies Fes International Exhibition Center
bet-infra.desc: Technical studies, construction supervision and reception of an 8000 mÂ² exhibition hall + Annexes.
bet-infra.fullDescription: Structural design and technical supervision for an 8000 mÂ² exhibition hall without intermediate supports. The challenge was designing a complex steel framework capable of supporting large spans while remaining aesthetic and economical. Our mission covered execution studies and rigorous site supervision.
details: Technical studies, construction supervision and reception of an 8000 mÂ² exhibition hall + Annexes (Civil works, steel framework and technical lots)

bet-retail.title: Retail Sector: TCE Studies for Stores in Multiple Cities
bet-retail.desc: TCE studies for stores in multiple cities.
bet-retail.fullDescription: Technical partner for retail outlet deployment (Decathlon type). We provide All Trades (TCE) studies: electricity, air conditioning, fire safety and structure. Our role is to ensure compliance with the brand's strict standards and delivery of the certificate of conformity within tight deadlines.
details: TCE studies (All Trades: Reinforced concrete, Framework, Electricity, Fluids)

bet-lourde.title: Heavy Industry Sector: Slab and Plant Framework Rehabilitation
bet-lourde.fullDescription: High-tech project in a steel environment. The task was to rehabilitate the slab supporting an electric arc furnace (EAF) subjected to temperatures of 1700Â°C and extreme vibrations. The study required advanced structural calculations and the use of special refractory concrete, as well as reinforcement of the surrounding framework.
details: Special study (outside codes and standards) of the EAF slab exposed to thermal flows from the electrode furnace (1700Â°C)

bet-logistique.title: Logistics Platform Sector: TCE Studies Dakhla Cold Storage Complex
bet-logistique.desc: TCE Studies Dakhla Cold Storage Complex.
bet-logistique.fullDescription: Complete design of a modern cold storage complex in Dakhla. Beyond the structure, the challenge was energy efficiency for cold production. We integrated a rooftop solar installation to power the compressors, thus significantly reducing operating costs.
details: Structural studies: civil works and framework

bet-sante.title: Healthcare Sector: TCE Studies Multiple Polyclinics and Hospital Complexes
bet-sante.desc: TCE Studies Multiple Polyclinics and Hospital Complexes.
bet-sante.fullDescription: Technical project management for healthcare facilities. Flow management (patients, staff, waste, sterile) and network technicality (medical gases, operating room air treatment) are at the heart of our studies. We guarantee reliable and maintainable installations for patient safety.

bet-batiment.desc: TCE Studies Multiple Buildings and Complexes.
bet-batiment.fullDescription: Coordination and management of complex real estate projects (offices, high-end residential). Our OPC (Scheduling, Management and Coordination) mission ensures schedule compliance and technical synthesis between different trades to avoid site conflicts.
